title: Rambles in Europe ... With historical facts relating to Scotch-American families, gathered in Scotland and the North of Ireland ... Illustrated
author: Morrison, Leonard Allison.
snippet: This clan had many places of strength in these parts, such as Sark, Kinmont, Hollgreen, Hollis, Mumbyhirst, the castle of Harelaw, Irving castle near Langholm, Whitehaugh, Mangerton, Puddington, Hilles, and others; yet Gilnockie hall, or the home at the Hollows just described, was the strongest of all.
